meanings.definition: A type of edible clam found in coastal waters.
meanings.sent1: I went to the beach and found some cohogs for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The restaurant served delicious cohogs with butter and garlic.
meanings.sent3: The cohogs at the seafood festival were the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The cohogs in the bucket looked like a hidden treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The salty taste of the cohogs lingered on my tongue long after the meal.

meanings.definition: The act of harvesting or consuming cohogs.
meanings.sent1: Fishing for cohogs is a popular activity in this area.
meanings.sent2: The locals shared stories of their cohog adventures by the shore.
meanings.sent3: I never knew cohogging could be so exciting until I tried it myself.
meanings.sent4: The sound of cohogs being gathered echoed across the bay.
meanings.sent5: The smell of fresh cohogs being cooked wafted through the air, making my stomach growl.

meanings.definition: A group of cohogs gathered together in a specific area.
meanings.sent1: The cohogs huddled together in the shallow waters.
meanings.sent2: A school of cohogs swam gracefully past the rocks.
meanings.sent3: The cohogs formed a perfect circle on the ocean floor.
meanings.sent4: The sight of so many cohogs in one place was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The fishermen rejoiced at the abundance of cohogs in the bay.
